contentrichtext.text: '''''[http://en.wikipedia.org/w/wiki.phtml?title=MediaWiki:VfD-WhyOnEarthWouldIWantToContributeToaWiki&action=edit To add to this deletion debate, click here]''''' Useful? --[[User:Yacht|Yacht]] 05:01, Mar 29, 2004 (UTC) * Why not? Keep. [[User:Fennec|Fennec]] 05:02, 29 Mar 2004 (UTC) *It's historic! See http://web.archive.org/web/20011111155241/www.wikipedia.com/wiki/Why_on_Earth_would_I_want_to_contribute_to_a_wiki [[User:Maximus Rex|Maximus Rex]] 05:02, 29 Mar 2004 (UTC) *Looks fine now that it's in the right namespace. - [[User:Hephaestos|Hephaestos]]|[[User talk:Hephaestos|§]] 06:09, 29 Mar 2004 (UTC) **History says its been there for 2 years. Keep, pages explaining just why anybody is interested in doing this seem to still be needed. -- [[User:Cyrius|Cyrius]] | [[User talk:Cyrius|Talk]] 06:15, Mar 29, 2004 (UTC) **but from the ''what links here'' record, there are only few pages link there. besides, i only mean this redirect page, not the page [[Wikipedia:Why on Earth would I want to contribute to a wiki]]. --[[User:Yacht|Yacht]] 08:42, Mar 29, 2004 (UTC) *Keep. Don't break links for no reason. This might be linked to externally. [[User:Angela|Angela]][[user talk:Angela|.]] 10:54, Mar 29, 2004 (UTC)
